Name: Martian Cheetos
Description: puffed and seasoned with local mars-grown spices, served with a creamy cheese dip.

Name: Tharsis Rings
Description: crispy onion rings made from locally-grown tharsis onions, served with a tangy mars-made ketchup.

Name: Mons Wings
Description: crispy chicken wings marinated in a spicy blend of mars-grown herbs and served with a zesty herb sauce.

Name: Ferrum Salad
Description: a refreshing mix of locally-grown red-hued lettuce and vegetables, topped with crumbled mars-grown feta cheese and a tangy balsamic dressing.

Name: Luft Potatoes
Description: crispy and light potato chips made from mars-grown potatoes, served with a creamy mars-made dip and a sprinkle of mars-grown herbs.

Name: Shrimp Feu
Description: delicate and flavorful shrimp dumplings steamed to perfection and served with a mars-made spicy dipping sauce.

Name: Deimos Scallops
Description: succulent scallops pan-seared with lemon butter and mars-grown herbs, served with a side of mars-grown vegetables.

Name: Martian Poke
Description: a fresh and colorful bowl featuring mars-grown vegetables and rice, topped with tender cubes of martian tuna.

Name: Hellas Steak
Description: juicy and flavorful steak cooked to perfection, topped with mars-grown chimichurri sauce and served with a side of mars-grown vegetables.

Name: Solis Lamb
Description: tender lamb shank slow-cooked with mars-grown root vegetables, served with a side of creamy mars-grown mashed potatoes.

Name: Valles Tofu
Description: flavorful stir-fried tofu made with mars-grown spices and vegetables, served with a side of fluffy mars-grown rice.

Name: Terra Bistecca
Description: juicy and tender steak grilled to perfection, served with a side of mars-grown roasted vegetables and creamy mars-grown mashed potatoes.

Name: Mons Salmone
Description: flaky and succulent salmon roasted with mars-grown herbs and lemon, served with a side of mars-grown rice and steamed vegetables.

Name: Kikkererwten Kerrie
Description: a fragrant and flavorful curry made with mars-grown chickpeas and a blend of aromatic mars-grown spices, served with a side of fluffy mars-grown naan bread.

Name: Marte Burger
Description: a juicy and flavorful burger made with mars-grown beef, served with a side of crispy mars-grown french fries and a mars-made ketchup.

Name: Pollo Alfredo
Description: tender and juicy chicken breast smothered in a creamy mars-made alfredo sauce, served over a bed of mars-grown linguine pasta.

Name: Olympus Tart
Description: a warm and flaky apple tart made with mars-grown cinnamon and served with a scoop of mars-grown vanilla ice cream.

Name: Rocky Brownies
Description: rich and fudgy brownies loaded with mars-grown nuts and chocolate chunks, served warm with a dollop of whipped cream.

Name: Marineris Bars
Description: sweet and tangy lemon bars made with mars-grown lemons, served with a dusting of mars-grown powdered sugar.

Name: Fragola Rossa
Description: a mouth-watering parfait featuring layers of creamy mars-grown yogurt, fresh mars-grown strawberries, and a crunchy mars-made granola topping.

Name: Mons Cioccolato
Description: rich and decadent chocolate cake made with mars-grown chocolate and dusted with mars-grown cocoa powder, served with a scoop of mars-grown vanilla ice cream.

Name: Gelato di Mons
Description: creamy and refreshing mars-grown vanilla ice cream drizzled with a mars-made caramel sauce and topped with crunchy mars-grown nuts.

Name: Tharsis Tea
Description: a fragrant and refreshing blend of mars-grown herbs, served hot or iced.

Name: Hellas Lemonade
Description: a thirst-quenching lemonade made with mars-grown lemons, served over ice.

Name: Mons Mocha
Description: a decadent coffee drink made with mars-grown chocolate and topped with a swirl of whipped cream.

Name: Elysium TÃ©
Description: a refreshing and aromatic blend of mars-grown herbs and spices, served hot or iced.

Name: Arancia di Acidalia
Description: a sweet and tangy orange juice made with mars-grown oranges and served over ice.

Name: Martini Mons
Description: a classic martini made with a mars-made vermouth and garnished with a mars-grown olive.

Name: Red Planet Margarita
Description: this classic cocktail gets a martian twist with a splash of cranberry juice, giving it a vibrant red hue. made with tequila, lime juice, and a hint of agave nectar, it's the perfect way to start your meal.

Name: Blue Moon Martini
Description: another colorful creation, this martini is made with blue curacao and vodka, giving it a brilliant blue color reminiscent of the martian sky. served with a twist of lemon.

Name: Cosmic Colada
Description: this tropical cocktail features pineapple juice, coconut cream, and white rum, all blended together for a creamy and refreshing treat. served with a slice of fresh pineapple.

Name: Solar Flare Sangria
Description: our signature sangria is made with red wine, brandy, and a mix of fresh fruit, including oranges, apples, and berries. it's the perfect drink for sharing with friends and fellow space travelers.

Name: Martian Mule
Description: this take on the classic moscow mule features ginger beer, lime juice, and vodka, with a splash of blue curacao for a bright green color. served in a copper mug for an extra touch of class.

Name: Orbiting Orang
Description: this refreshing cocktail features fresh orange juice, vodka, and a hint of triple sec, all shaken together and served over ice. it's the perfect way to cool down after a long day exploring the red planet.

Name: Alien Ale
Description: our signature beer is a light and refreshing ale, with a hint of citrus and a subtle hoppy finish. brewed with a special blend of martian-grown hops and barley, it's the perfect complement to any meal.
